items.content_html: A lightweight and low-code library for dynamic page generation and state management in React. Features include a range of controls, direct state interaction, cascading dropdowns, hierarchical page structure, validation tracking, and more, designed to enhance developer productivity and application performance

Features include a range of controls, direct state interaction, cascading dropdowns, hierarchical page structure, validation tracking, and more, designed to enhance developer productivity and application performance

items.content_html: üìã Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.
items.title: AndrewJBateman/angular-material-portfolio: :clipboard:  Angular Material & RxJS Observables are used to display my data. A Google Cloud Firestore NoSQL database stores the blog posts & Contact Form data. Anyone can read the blog posts. Angularfire-lite was used as a Firebase API wrapper as it is simple and lightweight, reducing Vendor bundle size & improving the Chrome Lighthouse score.

items.content_html: Discord.js MVC Microframework is a lightweight and user-friendly framework for building Discord.js bots using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern. It provides a structured approach to bot development, making it easier to organize your code and understand the flow of data.
items.title: 3h04m1/discord.js-mvc: Discord.js MVC Microframework is a lightweight and user-friendly framework for building Discord.js bots using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern. It provides a structured approach to bot development, making it easier to organize your code and understand the flow of data.
